attributes.action: Stop all budget cut's across the board and start increasing the budget's
attributes.additional_details: Police struggling to keep control of our streets with the force srinking. Schools proposing to teach a four day week due to lack of funds. Hospitals not having enough staff to help people and hospitals closing. Just some of the situations across the country that have people worrying about the future due to cuts we see year in year out.
attributes.background: The UK has undergone many years of budget cuts over and over again, councils are struggling. Our schools, hospitals, police, fire and rescue and roads are just some of the effected struggling to hold together and support the public. Enough is enough for the growing population.
